DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate association platelet inhibition surgery-related bleeding patient undergo non-cardiac surgery dual antiplatelet therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Platelet Inhibition Bleeding Patients Undergoing Non-Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: intake Clopidogrel , Prasugrel , Ticagrelor within last 7 day spontaneous bleed impeding surgery ( major vascular surgery , intraperitoneal intrathoracic surgery , ENTsurgery , orthopedic trauma surgery , prostatic surgery ) concomitant medication warfarin renal insufficiency need dialysis concomitant therapy GPIIB/IIIA Antagonists expect duration operation > 30min
